import React from 'react'; import './Login.css'; const Login = (props) => { const [containerActive, setContainerActive] = React.useState(false); const [form, setForm] = React.useState({}); const handleChange = async (e) => { await setForm(form + { [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) console.log(form); } const signInButton = () => { console.log("false") setContainerActive(false); } const signUpButton = () => { console.log("true") setContainerActive(true); } return (

); } export default Login;
